member.name: T:RubiksCore.CubeCopier
member.summary: Copies the cubies of an existing RubiksCube

member.name: M:RubiksCore.CubeCopier.#ctor(RubiksCore.RubiksCube)
member.param: The cube that will be copied

member.name: M:RubiksCore.CubeFace.GetPositionsOfLayersBeneathFace(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets CubiePositions for this face in addition to any number of layers deep.
member.param: The number of layers beneath the face to get positions for.
member.returns: The cumulative positions for this face and the layers beneath it.

member.name: T:RubiksCore.SolvedPuzzleCubieConfigurator
member.summary: Returns cubies in their solved state
